items.sentence: Can you explain why you turned down their proposal?
Tom won the International Chopin Piano Competition.
Tom didn't eat any of the cherries that I gave him.
No matter how much Tom eats, he never gains weight.
The elbow is the joint between the arm and forearm.
I wonder whether or not Tom has one I could borrow.
I wonder if Tom likes dancing as much as Mary does.
We had trouble getting the situation under control.
Tom was eager to get home to his wife and children.
Tom is rich enough to just about anything he wants.
They said he was still weak from a recent sickness.
Two of his children had died when they were babies.
Everything Tom predicted would happen has happened.
Tom worked part-time to put himself through school.
Can you recommend a place for me to stay in Boston?
What kind of trouble have you gotten yourself into?
We don't have to do anything that we don't want to.
Don't let Tom do anything that you think is unsafe.
I started playing the clarinet when I was thirteen.
Do you know who wrote the book that Tom is reading?
I don't think that I'll have time for that anymore.
This isn't the first time you've made this mistake.
How much would it cost me to have my house painted?
We need to know everything that you know about Tom.
I think that Tom's suggestion is worth considering.
Is that blue car parked in front of my house yours?
These two bottles have the same amount of medicine.
What do you recommend I see when I visit Australia?
Tom rowed across the lake in an old wooden rowboat.
Tom found a pair of rusty pliers behind his garage.
Tom ran so fast that we couldn't catch up with him.
Tom is very honest, so I'm sure we can rely on him.
Tom is smarter than your average college sophomore.
Don't you want to know the truth about that matter?
Do you think anyone would care if I didn't do that?
Don't you see that Tom is suffering because of you?
Tom is the guy standing over there near the window.
Were you able to figure out why that was happening?
This tree is approximately three hundred years old.
I have a lot of friends that can speak French well.
I had the sneaking feeling I'd forgotten something.
I'll be waiting for you when you get out of prison.
Tom asked me what I thought about his presentation.
I've never been very serious about learning French.
I believe Tom when he says he doesn't speak French.
Tom was surprised by how inexpensive the hotel was.
Tom lifted the lid to see if the water was boiling.
I just want to stay with you a little while longer.
I'm glad that you warned me before it was too late.
The knives, forks and spoons are in the top drawer.
